titleStmt.title: Loyalty speakes truth or, a conference of the grand mercvries, pragmaticus, melancholicus, and elenticus, concerning the present condition of his Majesty, and the proceedings of this blessed Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Nedham, Marchamont, 1620-1678.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 10th 1647"; the "8" in the imprint has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
